articles.title: ESA inaugurates deep space antenna in Australia - European Space Agency
articles.description: The European Space Agency (ESA) has expanded its capability to communicate with scientific, exploration and space safety missions across our Solar System with the inauguration of a new 35-m diameter deep space antenna – the fourth for Estrack, ESA’s deep spac…
